title: Add `Wireless Debugging` tile also
body:
Can you also add the `Wireless Debugging tile` also, as some apps need dev. options to be turned off. And after turning off the D.O., the wireless debugging tile removed. As the tile option from dev. options need dev. options to be turned on all time to access tiles. 

It will be helpful for users who use shizuku and apps time-to-time.
Just add that one tile also.
author: vippium

comments.body: Please check the new version (1.1.0) that is now available on F-Droid.

> Please check the new version (1.1.0) that is now available on F-Droid.

Thanks for Listening... Closing Now
Since there is no update, I assume it worked for you.
